Message.Text: Tommy, imagine how cool it would be if we used NoSQL for this project! The students would get hands-on experience with a cutting-edge technology!
That’s true, Frank! But you know what’s also cool? SQL is such a solid foundation, and the students could really master the core principles with it!
Yeah, but NoSQL would let them explore new horizons! Think about the possibilities with flexible schema designs and scalability!
I can see your point! They’d learn so much about working with big data in NoSQL, and it would be awesome to see their excitement when they realize the potential!
Exactly! And they’d get to experience something beyond traditional databases. This could really push their skills to the next level!
Alright, Frank, you’ve sold me! Let’s do it! I’m excited to see what the students come up with using NoSQL!
